rules_text:
Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
Propagate 2 [i](When this enters the battlefield, either put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens with “Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.”)[/i]
{1}{G}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.
